english.segment1: Who am I?. That You came to earth for me. To die on a tree?. Who are you?. Son of man, Son of God. Yes, I believe it's true. More than words I bring to You. May all I say and may all I do be
english.segment2: CHORUS. Hallelujah, hallelujah. May everything about me be. Hallelujah to my King. Hallelujah, hallelujah. May everything about me be hallelujah
english.segment3: All of me. I surrender completely. Take control. I want all of You. So I'm letting go
english.segment4: I am healed and I'm forgiven. I am free because I'm living
english.segment6: It's all so clear, it's all so clear. I was born to worship
english.segment7: Hallelujah, hallelujah. May everything about me be hallelujah.
